I didn't want to be overaggressive. I just wanted to let my teammates do what they had to do early in the game because they( Grizzlies) were taking away some of the shots I wanted by zoning up. Rafer Alston teammates held the fort, and then when I got an opportunity, I just tried to make the best of it. Allen Iverson made 10-of-24 shots, including 4-of-7 3-pointers. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Praising Eric Schmidt for his decade in charge of Google, Page said:'' Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly.
